name: wgu-extension-monorepo
description: WGU Extension monorepo with browser extension, Firebase functions, and website

scripts.build: pnpm run build:libs && pnpm --filter=extension run build && pnpm --filter=site run build
scripts.build:libs: pnpm --filter=data run build && pnpm --filter=functions run build && pnpm --filter=graphql-client run build
scripts.ci:validate: pnpm run validate:dependencies && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run lint
scripts.ci:build: pnpm run build:libs && pnpm --filter=extension run build && pnpm --filter=site run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules extension/node_modules functions/node_modules site/node_modules data/node_modules graphql-client/node_modules && pnpm store prune
scripts.emulators:seed: pnpm --filter=functions run dvc:pull && pnpm run emulators
